author: {'steamid': '76561198203153899', 'num_games_owned': 1287, 'num_reviews': 294, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1682038732}
review:
最大4人まで遊べるパーティーゲーム。

遊べるモードは2つでコインを集めるクラシックモードと宝箱を自陣に持ち帰るトレジャーランモードがある。
それぞれにキャラ性能（アビリティ）があり、落ちている武器の位置もランダム。
なのでただの殴り合いじゃなく武器やガード、アビリティ、マップによって戦い方を変えて遊べるのは楽しい。

自分が試した時はマルチプレイモードはサーバーに繋げる事が出来なかった。
ただリモートプレイトゥギャザーに対応しているので1人持っていればフレンドと遊べるので問題ない。
フレンドが足りなくてもCPUを追加して遊ぶことも出来る。
日本語未対応だがゲーム開始前にコントローラー、キーボードそれぞれの操作方法を教えてくれるので遊び方に悩む事もない。

ゲーム性が単純ですぐに遊べるのでフレンドとパーティゲームをしたい人はセール時に購入しておくことをおススメします。

author: {'steamid': '76561198037741353', 'num_games_owned': 1752, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1676691090}
review:
Simply put, this is a waste of money. The game is an arena battle game where you kill skeletons, goblins, and a couple other creatures for gold. Whoever picks up the most gold by the end of the 3 minute round wins. There's a second game mode that involves carrying a chest back to a designated zone and scoring points that way. Both of these game modes get old after 10-15 minutes. There are 6 maps available, the same in either mode, but unlike the game description they are anything but thrilling. They are extremely small, maybe 200-300 tiles max, and the 5 characters are just cosmetic. There are no gameplay differences between any of them.

This game claims to have online multiplayer, but it has been unavailable and non-functional since launch, so the only way to play this is local split-screen. The developers actually had the gall to post an updated in their News section about this game being Steam Deck verified, but why try to play it on there when the online is non-existent? They would have been better off pretending this game was abandoned because at this point it's a borderline scam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1667210131}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Арена в которой бродим по мелкой локации и убиваем монстров, тикает таймер. Дотикал до конца - конец игры. Ну во первых тут нет никакой одиночной игры... Есть возможность создать комнату на локальный мультиплеер и зайти туда одному. Но одному скучно проводить даже один раунд, а не то чтобы залипать в игре. В меню есть онлайн режим, но он не работает и не конектит к мастер серверу. Единственное, что позволит вам получить удовольствие от игры - живой друг и второй джойстик для него, а лучше 3 друга (ведь тут до 4х игроков). Хотя надолго ли вас хватит гонять в это? Крайне не рекомендую.

[h1]Оценка: 2/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
[quote] Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в кураторку
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/8114152] К и Ко [/url], там много других, хороших обзоров.
[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198120041629', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1645910194}
review:
[code][h1]IMPORTANT:[/h1][/code]
Lots of fun but VERY BRIEF and NO ONLINE PLAY. 
Overpriced for what you get. 

(Might be playable online via Steam Remote Play but I've never gotten that to work successfully yet.)

Now, that I have that out of the way, I can recommend this because it -[b]is[/b]- actually lots of fun.
That's the key point, this game is a lot of fun. 
If it were fun but not -as- much fun as it is, taking all other aspects into account, I would have recommended against it.

[code][h1]SUMMARY:[/h1][/code]
A nice person gave me a copy. 
You will not be playing it with me because you CAN NOT play it with me! 
Once you figure the mechanics out the CPUs won't stand a chance.

The controls take some getting used to but this is a good game if you plan on playing it LOCALLY with multiple controllers (maybe with your siblings, cousins, or niece or nephew or something). I could recommend it for that situation. It runs pretty well on low-end computers too. THERE IS NO ONLINE PLAY.


[code][h1]MAIN:[/h1][/code]
If you're one of my local irl friends, then you probably won't be reading this - you probably don't even have a Steam account. I do happen to know a few people who might enjoy playing this locally with me, though.

If you're one of my online friends, don't think you'll be able to pick this up and play it with me, though; it just won't happen. Online Multiplayer is non-existent even though the developer tags for the game say that there is Online Multiplayer. The servers for the game are no longer hosted and what would have been better is if they'd allowed the players to host their own servers like certain -other- top-selling games available for personal computer.

This isn't Pokemon or Animal Crossing where you have to worry about item duplication; therefore, there's no reason why they needed to NOT allow users to host the game server other than the stats marque which is irrelevant now anyways because no one is playing online - because they CAN'T.

So, even if I really like this game (and I really like it quite a lot actually), I can not recommend that my online friends get it because it has NO ONLINE PLAY.

Personally, IF I were able to play this online with my friends, I'd most definitely be recommending it to them. I really wanted to play this online with them. You can still play with the CPUs so this game isn't unplayable as it is but that's all that there is to it. It has no single-player minigames or story-campaign or anything. Only multiplayer mode - & the only reason that mode is playable as a single player is because of the CPUs. (You can also do a round by yourself without any CPUs but that's pretty pointless aside from learning the controls.) The only problem with that, and why it's no substitute for playing with real people is... [b]Once you figure the mechanics out the CPUs won't stand a chance.[/b]


[code][h1]CONSOLE VERSION MIGHT BE BETTER
(good luck getting all your friends to buy a console, lol):[/h1][/code]
Based off of what I've read, it MIGHT have online play on the console version (no guarantees), though, you may be finding yourself paying a subscription fee for online services in that case... 

(not to mention that it's not going to be worth it to buy a multi-hundred dollar console just to play this game, if you don't already have the console, 
which you might but your online friends (whether you met online or they just moved far away) may very well be in the situation where they'DON'T already have an expensive console to play this with you 
- AS WELL AS the fact that (personally) I'm more inclined to play a game like this online with my friends on the personal computer than on a console where I could play a "triple A" racing game or animal town building game with them instead & also prefer to use consoles for local play). 

For those reasons, the PC version is kind of like a bad port. (Which at any time they could make could by implementing that ONE change... but they probably won't...)


[code][h1]OTHER ISSUES & ADVICE:[/h1][/code]
Also,
The game also tells me I can press F1 to review the control instructions during a battle - no, actually, that didn't work.

Also,
The game does not stop when someone pauses, local, online, or by yourself; this is probably preparing you for it to be that way online, where it makes most sense, by treating multiplayer with CPUs the same way. This isn't an issue but in local multiplayer, the pause screen covers the entire screen, so even if you're just popping in to turn down the sound effects volume, it can be used to effectively obscure the screen for all players.

I'd say just ignore what is going on in the background when you pause to read the control instructions but I wasn't able to pause to read the control instructions for the previously mentioned reason that I couldn't get them to open during a match. Also, you drop your weapons when you die. It's not a big issue since weapons are super easy to get in this game but the best way to learn the controls is probably through trial an error - I'd recommend doing so on the Dungeon stage since it's easier to stay out of the line of enemies that will kill you (making you have to wait 5 seconds for a respawn) on the Dungeon stage.




[code][h1]CONCLUSION:[/h1][/code]
As part of a review, I'm obligated to point out: 
[b]A nice person gave me a copy.[/b] 

I also have an obligation to point out to my friends: 
[b]You will not be playing it with me because you CAN NOT play it with me![/b]


Unless they ever address the server issue (ideally by letting us host our own servers), only get this game if you're going to play it locally with someone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060688156', 'num_games_owned': 10119, 'num_reviews': 1366, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1567254630}
review:
感谢汉化语录的G佬送的K，接下来说说我对这个游戏的看法
[b]画面[/b]
非常像素风的画面，而且整个游戏的大小还不到70M，看起来目前大部分的独立游戏都是像素风格的，这个趋势也不知道是好是坏。所以对画面要求不高的，或者喜欢像素风格的玩家，估计会很喜欢这个类型的游戏吧。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1872066846
[b]游戏性[/b]
单人游玩的体验其实不是很好，就是只能刷刷小怪，捡各种武器，正键攻击，反键防御，空格是跳，跳起来能躲过敌人远程攻击。有体力槽要求，体力槽消耗完，无法进行攻击。这个设定大部分游戏都有，就不细说了。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1872066863
武器种类很多，有散弹枪，炸弹，弓箭，法杖，定时炸弹等武器，玩起来感觉打小怪的难度基本上没有，只要反应的过来，小怪是连摸都摸不到你的。
而且目前的地图数量也不是很多，模式也只有两种，一种是杀别的玩家和小怪捡取掉落的金币（小怪打死都会掉血瓶，每个血瓶能恢复15点生命值），在要求的时间到之后，获得金币最多的玩家获胜。另一种好像是把地图里的一个宝箱打破，然后将物品运送到己方基地就可以获得分数，时间到之后，获得分数最高的玩家获胜。
可选的人物，目前除了人物外貌和皮肤的不同，没见到什么特殊的技能，所以，单人玩起来只能打打小怪，其实还是很无趣的。
而多人模式的话....匹配了一会，根本没有别的玩家加入，不知道这个服务器是怎么运作的，是亚服连接不上外国人还是游戏人数太少，都是有可能的。
所以不建议没有基友的玩家购买，毕竟又是个撕逼游戏，这个游戏以目前的玩法和内容来看并不是特别推荐。
而且游戏没有中文，慎重。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1872066881
[b]声音[/b]
声音太过于重复，而且像素风特别强，有种小时候玩小霸王时候听的那种音乐（要强得多，但是没法和星露谷那种游戏比），打击音效也太过于单纯，如果多人玩，你倒是不会太过在意，但是我是一个人玩这个游戏，所以如果挑刺的话，这个声音还是不太喜欢的。
[b]评分[/b]
6/10
没有基友就不要买这个游戏了，单人模式真的是太无聊了。打一打小怪最后赢了挺没意思的。
[quote]
游玩百态，将游玩心得用汉语化作玩家的指明灯
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/35402408/]点击这里关注汉化语录~[/url] 如果喜欢这个评测，请点个赞让更多人看见
[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198258151083', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1559699579}
review:
最大4人のプレイヤーとその他mobモンスターたちが入り乱れて殺し合いをするツインスティックシューターです。
ゲームモードは2種類あって、制限時間内にコインを一番多く集めた人の勝利または宝箱を自分の陣地に持ち帰った人の勝利です。
Switch版は日本語化されているそうですが、勝利条件と操作方法のみ覚えてしまえば全く必要ありません。
それよりも問題なのはオンラインのマルチプレイができないことです。
オンラインを選んでも「サーバーが見つからない」と出るだけで、正式リリース前の早期アクセスの頃からその状態が続いているようです。
ローカルマルチやAIとのシングルプレイならできますが、オンラインを機能させる気がないならストアページから記述を削除するべきでしょう。
オンラインの表記を残したままセールとかやってる時点で詐欺る気があるとしか思えないので低評価にしておきます。
ちなみにSwitch版は最初からローカルのみとなってます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198239865012', 'num_games_owned': 1692, 'num_reviews': 552, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1537270887}
review:
DICE QUE TIENE MULTIPLAYER PERO NO CONECTA CON EL SERVER... Tiene solo dos opciones: multijugador local y multijugador... si bien se puede agregar personajes cpu para competir en local, el multiplayer no logra iniciar o conectar con los servidores... entonces su principal foco no funciona... una lastima el juego pinta re bien pero sinceramente es un error gravísimo... para eso ni pongas multijugador en las opciones y listo.

Repito: El juego esta bueno pero no puede ser que lo vendan con este error que caga el principal foco que es el multi player.

Si tenes amigos con los que jugar en tu casa o hermanos lo vale CREO pero aun asi sigue siendo un pisa papeles caro... por 100 pesos espera alguna oferta y comprate algo mejor...

review: Super Treasure Arena é a continuação de Treasure Arena anteriormente lançado para a chrome store gratuitamente,recheado de bugs,mas com uma ideia interessante,e pessoas em servers prontos para jogar com você,a continuação pegou tudo que o antigo tinha de bom e melhorou,o maior problema do jogo fica por conta do número de jogadores online,até o momento são muito poucos,se você estiver disposto a pagar R$15,99 para jogar online é um bom investimento,mas como disse,com os servers vazios o jogo não é tão interessante,mas ainda é um prato cheio para jogadores que gostarem do estilo do jogo,os controles são ótimos,e mesmo em Early Acess o jogo apresenta muito potencial

review:
Ein gutes, spaßiges und kurzweiliges Spiel mit viel Charm - gemeinsam mit Freunden im TS führt es zu jeder Menge wüster Beschimpfungen  und gemeinsamen Lachern. Am Balancing müsste noch etwas gearbeitet werden. Der Rogue kam uns allen stets als schwächstes Glied vor, vielleicht war unser Skill auch nicht ausgeprägt genug.

Insgesamt bereitet es viel Spaß.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003030375', 'num_games_owned': 3129, 'num_reviews': 773, 'playtime_forever': 377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 377, 'last_played': 1477117466}
review:
Super Treasure Arena:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
 
Regardless of which class you are, the stakes are extremely high! Who of the four contestants will collect the most coins? 3..2..1… IT’S ON at the Super Treasure Arena!

Super Treasure Arena is a local/online co-op game where you fight against three other competitors in six small top-down maps. The game has two modes to choose from: Free for All and Treasure Run.

In Free for All, you have to collect as many coins as possible, and in the Treasure Run, you have to carry has many treasure chests to your home base as you can. In both game modes, you only have 180 seconds to amalgamate either coins or chests and finish first in the battle.

After selecting which mode to play, it will be time to choose your character class, with five classes in total to choose from: Warrior, Rogue, Mage, Ninja and Mystic. Apart from looking slightly different, it really comes down to special ability. For example, the Warrior can activate the shield ability for a short period of time, and during that time no-one can inflict any damage upon him. Each class has its own ability which makes the game really fun to play. 

In each map, you will find weapons (shotguns, torch, bombs and others) on each corner and sometimes in the centre. As soon as you run over one, it will automatically become your main weapon, but don’t panic, you can revert to your favourite weapon with the LT button on your gamepad. Each map has its own enemies to deal with, too. At the Cove map, crabs and bandits might spot you and chase you for the kill - it’s madness! 

Each time you hit a foe, he will drop chocolate, presenst and different goodies. They are actually the coins, so run over them to acquire them. If you get killed, you will drop your goodies. . . Fun, Fun Fun! Find the chest and destroy it to collect more coins! 

Super Treasure Arena is not easy to master and it is part of the charm of this game. However, I think the controls should be better and you might find aiming with the projectile can be a bit of a struggle. I really like the pixel graphics and the soundtrack is good.

Positives:
~~~~~~~ 

-	Nice pixel graphics
-	Good soundtrack
-	Fun and fast gameplay
-	Online and local co-op
-	Achievements

Negatives:
~~~~~~~~ 

-	Controls need to be improved
-	No trading cards

Whether you play online, local or against the AI, the next 180 seconds in Super Treasure Arena will be manic fun!

7/10

Key provided by developer/publisher for review purposes. Any opinions expressed are entirely my own!

[url=https://www.zeepond.com/reviews][b]EPIC “THE CPT FROGGY” REVIEWS UP NOW ON ZEEPOND, THE HOME OF THE ALMIGHTY FROG![/b][/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198020087176', 'num_games_owned': 905, 'num_reviews': 234, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1474782990}
review:
Super Treasure Arena   - Reviews de titulos indies en www.crgamershub.club.

Una vez más hemos podido probar un juego independiente con arte pixelado, se trata de Super Treasure Arena, un juego de acción multijugador para hasta cuatro jugadores en linea o de manera local que nos hará sentir como si estuviésemos jugando en consolas de hace 20 años. El juego es desarrollado por el equipo independiente Vennril (Que cuenta con solo un integrante) y distribuido por Headup Games (Bridge Constructor, Dead Age, etc.)

Desde una vista top-down nuestro objetivo es conseguir la mayor cantidad de oro posible mientras intentamos destruir a nuestros enemigos, ya sean monstruos del juego, otros jugadores del online o nuestros propios amigos, creando situaciones caóticas que se vuelven super chistosas y emocionantes, pues puedes verte luchando mas por tu vida que por el propio oro que es nuestro objetivo. Las partidas son cortas, los mapas también son pequeños, haciendo que los jugadores se enfrasquen en batallas campales en pos de la mayor ganancia de oro, cada vez que eliminemos a un contrario su oro caerá por doquier y es ahí donde debemos apresurarnos a robarle antes de que otro jugador nos elimine a nosotros.


Uno de los rasgos mas divertidos de Super Treasure Arena son los distintos tipos de armas, que si bien no son muchas, son las suficientes, podemos encontrar bombas (Que a mis amigos MaironStyle y ^RINO33CR^ les hacía recordar con cariño a Bomberman), cohetes, arcos, varitas mágicas lanza fuego y escopetas, las armas mencionadas anteriormente se encuentran de manera aleatoria en el mapa de la partida y los personajes jugables usan armas de ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, de momento hay cinco razas o personajes distintos a escoger: Warrior, Rogue, Mage, Mystic y Ninja, cada personaej puede realizar un ataque especial el cual se carga en una barra y se llena conforme causemos daño a los demás.


Cabe destacar que el título esta en etapa de Early Access, más contenido, mejoras, “tweaks” y demás han de ser añadidas al juego. Podemos jugar de manera local en pantalla dividida con nuestros amigos en casa o en linea con otros jugadores -nos fué difícil encontrar otros jugadores para jugar. De momento existen dos modos de juego:

Classic: Nos invita a recoger monedas de cofres y de monstruos que encontremos en el mapa o que podamos robar a los demás.
Trasure Run: Es el mas difícil pues tienes que recoger un cofre con oro y llevarlo hasta tu lugar de “spawn” para poder ganarlo, pero no es tan fácil, pues cargar con el tesoro te hace caminar muy lento, lo cual los demás podrán aprovechar para acabar contigo.
Super Treasure Arena

El juego tiene soporte completo para mandos, nosotros lo probamos con control de Xbox 360, y la verdad encontramos que es más preciso jugar con el teclado y el mouse, esto debido a que debes ajustar hacia donde quieres disparar con el stick derecho y claramente el mouse permite mas agilidad para dichos ejercicios. Hasta hoy el juego tiene seis mapas y algunos podrían parecer muy similares entre si dando cierto aire repetitivo. También es posible jugar con los llamados bots, de modo que si estamos solos o con un amigo nada mas, los otros dos pueden ser controlados por el CPU.

Super Treasure Arena es sin duda una excelente opción casual para pasarla bien con nuestros amigos, cualquier computadora puede correr el juego, la descarga del mismo pesa 20mb -Si, 20mb nada mas. Un título que ofrece muchísimo más de lo que parece y tiene muchísima diversión para aquellos que lo compren (cuesta solo $8),  sumándole que está en Early Access y más contenido está por venir es una buena oportunidad para hacerse con el y ayudar a su desarrollador en el proceso.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059561891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 416, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1474707944}
review:
DISCLAIMER: This game is still in Early Access. All thoughts and opinions therein are related to the game during its development state. Features/content are subject to change and not a final representation of the game.

I am a huge sucker for four player local/online co-op games, I love them. From Towerfall, Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime, Duck Game, and most recently Overcooked, these are all games that I have enjoyed immensely for many different reasons. From the distribution of tasks in Overcooked and Lovers, to the utter chaos in Duck game and Towerfall. These games all manage to bring a unique flavor and idea to the four player setting while drastically being different from each other.

For the most part, Super Treasure Arena has all the right ideas. Collect gold, kill your friends/npcs using a variety of weapons/classes. Whoever at the end of the round with the most gold wins. Sounds simple enough but that is where I find fault with the game. It is rather too simplistic, what you see is what you get, there is nothing really that separates this from the rest and makes it shine on its own. It's a chaos = fun equation that you see in these types of game.


That being said what currently is in the game is made rather well. You have five adorable pixel classes, two game modes, six levels with varied designs. The graphics are rather smooth and animations, explosions, effects all seem fluid and colorful. The UI is super simplistic and the game does feature controller support, although I found aiming a tad bit easier with my keyboard/mouse. Additionally the game does feature online support and local support which is no small and easy feature to include. (Multiplayer is scary to program)


Sadly, I didn't get to play any online matches as the community is still growing. The game does have Bots that you can use in the place of players. So I got a basic idea of how chaotic things can get. Of course that is the linchpin with these types of games, if you can't find a match or have four reliable friends to play with your not getting maximum enjoyment out of the game. Your mileage may vary and that is true with all games in the genre.

At the end of the day, I just want more out of this game. More classes, more game modes(CTF, Team matches, co-op, horde mode, etc), perhaps customization of our sprites, more weapons, you get the idea. The Steam page does make mention of more content in the future. What that content is and when it is released is yet to be seen. The core of the game is in place now it just needs to pull ahead and define itself.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994666064', 'num_games_owned': 3746, 'num_reviews': 611, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1493300950}
review:
Bom, é um jogo bacana, esse é daquele tipo meio "Party Game", perfeito para se jogar com os amigos em tela dividida, apesar de tudo fornece suporte a partidas online. Aqui você tem que pegar tesouros ao máximo, então a gritaria é garantida com os jogadores desesperados para lucrar ao máximo até o fim da partida. Em especial o modo de roubar o tesouro foi o que mais me agradou. Se estiver procurando algo apenas para passar o tempo e rir um pouco, esse pode ser uma opção legal. Análise detalhada aqui:

http://www.nerdmaldito.com/2016/09/super-treasure-arena-pixels-tiros-e.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198276798449', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1493286459}
review:
Достаточно яркая и бодрая арена. Стоять на месте не получится, поверьте. Разок попробовал с друзьями, понравилось.
По графике и так видно, что игра пиксельная, поэтому кому не нравится, то проходим мимо, некоторые же тащутся от такой графики... Я нейтрально отношусь, лишь бы интересная игра получилась, но это только к инди-проектам так, а к серьёзным играм и серьёзные требования)
Минусом на данный момент отнесу мёртвый мультиплеер, если захочется поиграть нормально, то необходимо договариваться со знакомыми, благо у меня таких несколько оказалось, такие хомяки как и я, которые берут все игры подряд:)
Можно конечно и одному поиграть, но не сильно интересно, так как в любом случае выйдешь победителем.

author: {'steamid': '76561198198643563', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1474506312}
review:
A very fun game with great multiplayer. I had a blast playing it as an HTML5 game before they put it on Steam, both with friends and with random people online. Everything feels cohesive and polished overall, and the gameplay is tight and fast-paced. Haven't been able to try Online yet, but Local Mode is really solid.

This is a good game for messing around with friends over.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140908266', 'num_games_owned': 1742, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1552390454}
review:
Super Treasure Arena - динамичный шутер с приятной пиксельной графикой. В игре вас ждет множество разнообразного оружия, 5 классов и 6 карт для прохождения. Также тут присутствует мультиплеер, что является несомненным плюсом для игры с друзьями. А сейчас о плюсах и минусах игры:
Плюсы:
+Графика
+Геймплей
+Мульпиплеер
+Цена

Игра стоит своих денег, тем более на неё сейчас скидка!
Рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561198128201856', 'num_games_owned': 1545, 'num_reviews': 159, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1627222809}
review:
Super Treasure Arena: Интересная пиксельная арена, с возможностью игры до 4-х игроков.
На выбор вас ожидает 6 различных карт, 5 классов (Воин, Разбойник, Маг, Мистик, ниндзя +каждый класс обладает особым умением, несколько игровых режимов, приятная пиксельная графика, динамичный геймплей.
Игрушка действительно динамичная и заманчивая, советую если не играть, так хоть попробовать. Думаю, особо интересно будет играть со своей командой.
Минусов так таковых я не нашел, так что думаю игра свою цену оправдывает :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198057334690', 'num_games_owned': 2528, 'num_reviews': 193, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1590084906}
review:
Пиксельная арена, расчитанная на 4 человек. 

Вас ждёт:
- 6 карт
- 5 классов
- 2 режима игры
- много видов оружия

Геймплей отличается в зависимости от выбранного режима: классический (собрать больше монет, чем оппоненты) и режим, в котором вы получаете очки за то, что донесли квестовый сундук в отмеченную зону.

В наличии локальный и онлайн мультиплеер, а так же возможность играть на одном экране нескольким людям.

Единственный минус - не смог понять как изменить класс персонажа и добавить ботов.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048584548', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 747, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 584, 'last_played': 1632539990}
review:
Awesome class based MOBA that takes a high level of skill to master. Game is still in early-access as of writing this, more features will be added and changed. I Highly recommend. The controls are WASD to move and mouse to aim, but it plays great with a dual joystick controller. I've put many hours int the original browser Treasure Arena because its an awesome competitive pvp game. This new version adds some new things. Two new classes, the ninja and the mystic, and new special abilities for every class (the warrior is similar to the original). Along with additional balance changes to gameplay to make players less invincible with a shield and well timed jumps.

I give the developer 10/10

EDIT: This game is missing some features from the original treasure arena. Until Vennril (the developer) adds back some old mechanics (sprinting and rolling, mainly, but also jumping while shooting) I will be playing the original treasure arena (which is free, and in-browser). I still recommend this game as an early access very simple WASD moba with quick matches that is very fun to play with friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064445036', 'num_games_owned': 1449, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1474104987}
review:
Was ist Super Treasure Arena? Wie der Name schon fast sagt, ist es ein Arena Shooter. Sinn des Spiel ist es so viele Münzen wie möglich zu sammeln oder so viele Truhen wie möglich zu bekommen. Das heißt Monster töten oder im Fall der Truhen, einfach Truhen aufnehmen und in die Eigene Basis bringen. Es gibt derzeit 5 verschiedene Waffen, 5 verschiedene Charaktere und 6 verschiedende Maps. Doch der größte Kniff an dem Spiel ist der Multiplayer, welcher zwar noch nicht geht aber dieses Spielerlebnis noch verbessern wird und in Zukunft viele schöne Kämpfe bieten wird. Natürlich ist es schon möglich mit Bots zu spielen, welche eine gute KI haben aber gegen Reale Menschen wird das sicher noch viel besser. Ich gebe dem Spiel einen Daumen nach oben, hoffe das der Multiplayer bald geht und es immer wieder neuen Content gibt, damit das Spiel sich lange hält.

Reale Menschen auch hier zu finden:http://www.twitch.tv/thebenjaminkendrick

author: {'steamid': '76561198089503865', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 601, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 302, 'last_played': 1649430119}
review:
Nice game, Its alot of fun if you wish to show your friend a lesson in greed, music is nice and fits with the way the game looks.
2 modes and up to 4 players together with the diffrent classes weapons and abilitys, it can be alot of fun, and even alone vs the com enemys can be pretty challenging, it defenitly was worth the money. 

it also seems like the Developer is continueing the game, i would highly recommand you ( reading person ) to at least give it a try with a friend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116098408', 'num_games_owned': 3520, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1496912429}
review:
看到像素风就忍不住剁手，然而这是个多人撕逼游戏...

目前就两种模式，一个抢夺金币模式，攻击其他玩家或是野怪掉落金币，在限定时间内获得最多金币者获胜；另一个是运宝箱模式，将宝箱运回自己的基地可获得分数，在限定时间内获得最高分获胜。

武器的种类貌似有点少，玩起来有点像弹幕游戏，空格跳起来能躲过子弹，或者右键格挡。

暂时没发现不同职业之间的差别，初始武器都是近战...

抢先体验模式呢... 先观望观望吧。

没有基友一起玩不建议购买，在线游戏并不多人。

还有这是少数杉果价格能吊打steam的游戏，杉果原价24... 现在打折18.4，然而不能退款。
